SELECT DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(MIN(PRICE_DATE), '%Y-01-01'), INTERVAL (FLOOR(DAYOFYEAR(MIN(PRICE_DATE)) / 3) * 3) - 1 DAY) AS PRICE_DATE, AVG(AVG_PRICE) AS AVG_PRICE FROM AREA_AVG WHERE price_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) AND OIL_CATEGORY = #{oilCategory} AND AREA_NAME = #{areaName} GROUP BY YEAR(PRICE_DATE), -- 1. 연도별로 먼저 묶고 FLOOR(DAYOFYEAR(PRICE_DATE) / 3) -- 2. 1년 중 날짜를 5로 나눈 몫으로 그룹화 ORDER BY MIN(PRICE_DATE) ASC
/* GROUP BY YEAR(PRICE_DATE), -- 1. 연도별로 먼저 묶고 FLOOR(DAYOFYEAR(PRICE_DATE) / 14) -- 2. 1년 중 며칠째인지를 14로 나눈 몫으로 그룹화 YEARWEEK(PRICE_DATE) -- '2025년 45주차'처럼 고유한 '주' 단위로 그룹화 */

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(MIN(PRICE_DATE), '%Y-%m-01') AS PRICE_DATE, AVG(AVG_PRICE) AS AVG_PRICE FROM AREA_AVG WHERE PRICE_DATE >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND OIL_CATEGORY = #{oilCategory} AND AREA_NAME = #{areaName} GROUP BY YEAR(PRICE_DATE), MONTH(PRICE_DATE) ORDER BY YEAR(PRICE_DATE), MONTH(PRICE_DATE) ASC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(MIN(PRICE_DATE), '%Y-%m-01') AS PRICE_DATE, AVG(AVG_PRICE) AS AVG_PRICE FROM AREA_AVG WHERE OIL_CATEGORY = #{oilCategory} AND AREA_NAME = #{areaName} GROUP BY YEAR(PRICE_DATE), MONTH(PRICE_DATE) ORDER BY YEAR(PRICE_DATE), MONTH(PRICE_DATE) ASC
